ogTitle: republican congressman mark sanford will challenge pres. trump - smarther news
ogDescription: i think we need to have a conversation on what it means to be a republican.
quote: I think we need to have a conversation on what it means to be a Republican.
summary: Republican Congressman Mark Sanford will challenge Pres. Trump
body:
• Congressman Mark Sanford: Republican from South Carolina
  • Third candidate to challenge Pres. Trump for the Republican nomination for President.
  • The other two challengers: Former Massachusetts Gov. Bill Weld & Former Congressman Joe Walsh (Illinois).

Heas in: Mark Sanford, SC Republican, formally declares GOP White House 2020 bid
